Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Reefer \Reef"er\ (-?r), n. 1. (Naut.) One who reefs; -- a name often given to midshipmen. --Marryat. [1913 Webster]
2. A close-fitting lacket or short coat of thick cloth. [1913 Webster] [1913 Webster]
reefer n : marijuana leaves rolled into a cigarette for smoking [syn: {joint}, {marijuana cigarette}, {stick}, {spliff}]
